title.name: Title
title.description: Provide the title of the model
title.help: If not provided, defaults to none

version.name: Version
version.help: If not provided, defaults to none

authors.name: Authors
authors.help: If not provided, defaults to none

description.name: Description
description.description: Provide a description of the model
description.help: If not provided, defaults to none

doi.name: DOI
doi.description: Provide the doi for a publication using this model
doi.help: Please provide the DOI code without a URL prefix. If not provided, defaults to none

sourceCodeUrl.name: Source code URL
sourceCodeUrl.description: Provide a link to the repository of source code
sourceCodeUrl.help: If not provided, defaults to none

sourceCodeLicenseUrl.name: Source code license URL
sourceCodeLicenseUrl.description: Provide a link to the license for the source code
sourceCodeLicenseUrl.help: If not provided, defaults to none

inputDataUrl.name: Input data URL
inputDataUrl.description: Provide a link to model configuration or parameter files
inputDataUrl.help: If not provided, defaults to none

rawOutputDataUrl.name: Raw output data URL
rawOutputDataUrl.description: Provide a link to raw outputs from the source code
rawOutputDataUrl.help: If not provided, defaults to none
